parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF11240063) at the end. This strongly suggests electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for tracking electoral campaign spending and are mandated for candidates.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Alternativa pentru Demnitatea Națională - ADN" and its candidate "Ioan Moldovan" for the Chamber of Deputies, position 20. This directly refers to a specific parliamentary candidate and party participating in the election.  Article 36 (7) - a applies.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this message is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. The use of Facebook as a platform further supports this.  It's not a private communication.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support ADN and Ioan Moldovan. The phrases "Votam Alternativa pentru Demnitatea Națională - ADN", "votam Ioan Moldovan", and "votam pozitia 20" explicitly urge voters to vote for a specific candidate and party. This directly aims to influence the election outcome. Article 36 (7) - c applies.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks any journalistic elements. It does not provide news, analysis, or opinions; instead, it directly promotes a specific candidate and party. It does not adhere to journalistic standards of objectivity and impartiality.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear call to action to vote for a specific candidate.  The post lacks any personal reflection or subjective viewpoint.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>620144230341700</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Ioan Moldovan) and party (ADN) participating in the parliamentary elections, it targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and its clear objective is to influence voters to support the mentioned candidate. The presence of a CMF number further reinforces this conclusion.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Ioan Moldovan</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>FRP</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Federatia Romanilor de Pretutindeni, pentru incalcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul 620144230341700, care promovează candidatul Ioan Moldovan de la Alternativa pentru Demnitate Națională (ADN) pentru Camera Deputaților, poziția 20,  folosind fraze precum "Votam Alternativa pentru Demnitatea Națională - ADN", "votam Ioan Moldovan", și "votam pozitia 20", având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea candidatului menționat, fapt ce constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie. Prezența numărului CMF11240063 confirmă natura electorală a postării.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
